item.title: Higher Ferritin Threshold Identifies More Adults With Anemia
item.description: The AGA’s revised ferritin criteria expanded anemia detection, identifying 3.3 million more affected adults in the US. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Families Report Diaper Shortage When Asked
item.description: Pediatricians call diaper insecurity an underrecognized health-related social need. Medscape Medical News
